channel.title: CMD on Yougg's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CMD on Yougg's Blog

item.title: Command Note
item.description: 查看进程环境变量 Linux tr \\0 \\n < /proc/${PID}/environ ps eww -p ${PID} Solaris pargs -e ${PID} Windows PowerShell (Get-Process -id %PID%).StartInfo.EnvironmentVariables 挂载/卸载分区 Windows :: 查看分区信息 mountvol /? :: 卸载分区 mountvol D: /D :: 挂载分区 mountvol D: \\?\Volume{e316bd82-2441-11e5-9656-d6d12ffbbef0} 修改系统代理 Linux export http_proxy='http://x.proxy.com:8080' export

item.title: Windows系统中查找命令的路径
item.description: 实现类似Linux中的which/type命令的效果 In CMD: where cmd for %x in (powershell.exe) do @echo %~$PATH:x In PowerShell: Get-Command where
